page.title: 14Chatteris - A Child's Day
page.content:
For an hour we struggle with Maths. We work individually and have to have every sum correct. Playtime comes at 10.30 when we run around and shout for 15 mins. For the rest of the morning we have more hard work to do. Twelve 0'clock is lunch time. Some children have hot lunches, some bring a packed lunch and some go home to eat.
Afternoon school lasts from 1.15 to 3.30. We do many different things like Art, Music, Games and Projects. After School I attend a Church Choir practice then have tea at home. In the evening I usually watch T.V. and go to bed at 9.30.
